uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo

Class RunTestsMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.AbstractFitNesseMojo
        • uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.RunTestsMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo, SurefireReportParameters
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VerifyMojo

    public class RunTestsMojo
extends AbstractFitNesseMojo
implements SurefireReportParameters
    Goal that runs FitNesse tests using fitnesse.junit.TestHelper. Intended to be bound to the 'integration-test' phase.
    See Also:
    TestHelper
    Is defined by the goal name:
    run-tests
    Is bound to the specified phase of the standard build lifecycle:
    integration-test
    Requires the dependencies in this specified scope:
    runtime
